analysis.key_quote: It is a good policy, but since it is the responsibility of public officials here, we need to examine whether the performance is high or low in terms of the national well-being index and infrastructure.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses a general approval of the policy but does not provide a clear stance on its implications for civil service protections or politicization. It focuses on performance evaluation without addressing the core issues related to the proposed rule.
